mapper.select: SELECT id, file_url, lat, lng, taken_at, order_index, created_at, group_id FROM photo WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photo (file_url, lat, lng, taken_at, order_index, created_at, group_id) VALUES (#{fileUrl}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{takenAt}, #{orderIndex}, #{createdAt}, #{groupId})
